name: WESTERN GAME
description:
Online game, which transfers players to the Wild West during the times of duels. Dynamic battles, a variety of weapons, extensive customization options, many ways to increase the performance of your character, the clan system, bright and stylish graphics - and this is not all the features of this game.

Features:
• Bright, stylish graphics
• Colorful effects
• Various abilities to customize the character
• A clan system that opens access to unique items
• There are many ways to gain an advantage in battle - from the usual purchase of weapons to tattooing, increasing the various indicators
